name: Balaji J
category: Finance & Insurance > Life and Disability Insurance
top_product: Term Insurance: Term insurance provides pure life coverage for a specified term or duration. It is an essential product for individuals looking to financially protect their loved ones in the event of their untimely demise. It offers a lump sum payout to beneficiaries if the policyholder passes away during the policy term. Health Insurance: Health insurance is designed to cover medical expenses and healthcare costs. It ensures that individuals and families have access to quality medical care without the burden of high out-of-pocket expenses. Group Insurance: Group insurance typically refers to policies offered to a group of people, often by employers to their employees. It can include both life and health insurance, providing a cost-effective way to provide coverage to a large number of individuals. Employer-Employee Insurance: This is a subset of group insurance specifically tailored for the relationship between employers and their employees.
ideal_referral: Ideal referrals are typically individuals, newly married couples, new parenting, planning for regular income,companies looking for comprehensive coverage, looking for tailor made insurance solutions as per their Age and Needs
top_problem_solved: "One of my most significant achievements was helping a customer seamlessly navigate the claims process without ever leaving the comfort of their home. I implemented a fully digital process that not only saved them time and hassle but also ensured a swift resolution.
my_favourite_bni_story: "I had a remarkable experience where I helped a fellow member in cross chapter with their health insurance claim. While their policy was initially purchased in Karnataka, I stepped in and guided them through the process, ensuring that the claim was submitted locally. I'm thrilled to share that our efforts paid off, and the claim was successfully cleared. This success story underscores my commitment to going the extra mile to assist clients and ensure they receive the benefits they deserve.

category: Real Estate Services > Real Estate Development

top_product: DTCP & RERA APPROVED Projects
ideal_referral: Those who are looking for passive income in Plot Investment
top_problem_solved: Customer and his friend came to visit the site. He was looking for a plot investment around 5 to10 cents approximately for 5000000. I gave them an idea saying , if they invest 50 lakhs in my Krishna avenue project which costs 3.75 lakhs per cent , they can get 2 lakhs as a profit per cent within 2 years. Listening to this his friend who came with no idea to purchase plot showed his interest , but he had already personal, home and car loans as his commitments. Although he wanted to invest in this plot. I suggested him to convert the entire loan to single loan by letting him to take over this entire loan from the new bank so he will get some additional amount as a topup. With the topup amount he procured 5 cents plot. This idea made him to pay the same EMI amount as before, but now he has got a passive income with this asset as well. The customer felt very happy with my approach and he started referring his friends and families who are looking for passive income
my_favourite_bni_story: Looking forward for exiting success stories
